name: Heist Academy
description:
Heist Academy is a puzzle and stealth 3D game set in a college for thiefs

You will play the role of Fred, an apprentice white-collar thief who will have to go through the different scenarios that have been invented in the academy, fulfilling the goal of stealing the masterpiece in each of them.

The player will have to steal the principal object solving puzzles and avoid being spotted by the cameras or the guards by making noise or hiding from them inside the lockers or wardrobes.

  • Download the .rar file
  • Decompress
  • Run the .exe file
  • Play the game!
  • You can change the language on the Settings menu
